text: Fra Ferrante Bacciocchi (17th century) was an Italian painter active in Ferrara. He had joined as a monk of the order of Phillip Neri. He painted a Stoning of St. Stephen for the church of San Stefano in that city; and for Santa Maria del Suffragio he painted a Holy Family. ==References== * Category:17th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Italian Baroque painters Category:Ferrarese painters Category:Year of death unknown Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Ferrante Bacciocchi
